entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
